hits.definition:
取

[qǔ] take, get, fetch

历

[lì] (F 歷) 历史 lìshǐ history; 经历 jīnglì experience,

(F 曆) 日历 rìlì calendar

{Compare with 厉 lì severe}

越

[yuè] 越…越… the more... the more...

商

[shāng] discuss, business

研

[yán] grind, (= 研究 yánjiū) study, research

像

[xiàng] resemble, (= 肖像 xiàoxiàng) portrait, image

广 (F 廣)

[guǎng] wide, extensive

[yǎn] (when referring to the radical)
